long_description: Made with only the finest fair trade ingredients, an Organic Chocolate Bar from Equal Exchange will satisfy your sweet tooth and your conscience. Chocolate is made from cacao harvested by small-scale farmer co-operatives in Peru and the Dominican Republic using sustainable harvesting methods. Bars are certified USDA organic and Kosher. Nutritional values and ingredients vary by flavor. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Made with only the finest fair trade ingredients, an Organic Chocolate Bar from Equal Exchange will satisfy your sweet tooth and your conscience.
